achievements: Acclaimed for his innovative interpretations of Bach's music
Known for his eccentricities and perfectionism
Nominated for eight Academy Awards and won three Tony Awards and three Emmy Awards.
Known for roles in films like 'Fatal Attraction', 'Dangerous Liaisons' and 'Albert Nobbs'
Co-founded the Eagles, one of the best-selling music groups of all time.
Wrote and performed iconic hits like 'Hotel California' and 'Take It Easy'
One of the greatest fast bowlers in cricket history.
Took over 560 Test wickets for Australia
Star midfielder for Tottenham Hotspur and England national team.
Managed several English clubs including Chelsea and Tottenham
